name: Professional Development (selkieofdoom)
description:
This is a 70% accurate simulation of what life was like at my office not too long ago.  Not done yet (you'll see when you get to the ending).  Still pleasant enough to share for now.  Talk to coworkers, collect treats & items, and have fun :)

Gameplay: 1-4 minutes

On mobile:  Swipe up, down, left, and right to move.  Tap to go through dialog.

On laptop/desktop: Use arrow keys to move and go through dialog.

Music is "Lofi Tie" by NaturesEye on Pixabay
